sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button class="btn" :class="[`btn-${type}`, `btn-${size}`]">
        {{ label }}
    </button>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: "MyButton",
        props: {
            label: String,
            type: {
                validator(value) {
                    return [
                        "primary",
                        "outline-primary",
                        "link",
                        "tertiary",
                        "secondary",
                    ].includes(value);
                },
            },
            size: {
                validator(value) {
                    return ["sm", "md", "lg", "xl"].includes(value);
                },
            },
        },
    };
</script>
